parameters.description_cn: bed file, only used for WES mode (default: BV4)range: <ACV6|ACV6-38|AV2|AV2-38|AV5|AV5-38|AV6|AV6-38|AV7|AV7-38|AiJi|AiJi-38|BV4|BV4-38|BV5|BV5-38|IDT|IDT-38|NME|NME-38|NV3|NV3-38|TV1.2|TV1.2-38|user_defined_path>ACV6      Agilent.V6COSMICAV2       Agilent_Exome_V2AV5       Agilent_Exome_V5AV6       Agilent_Exome_V6AV7       Agilent_Exome_V7AiJi      AIJI_ExomeBV4       BGI_Exome_V4_kitBV5       BGI_Exome_V5_kitIDT       xgen_targetNME       Nimblegen_MedExome_V2NV3       Roche_SeqCapEZ_Exome_v3.0TV1.2     Illumina.truseq.v1.2notice:1. "*-38" is used for hg38, e.g. "BV4-38";2. user defined bed file path is supported;
parameters.description_en: bed file, only used for WES mode (default: BV4)range: <ACV6|ACV6-38|AV2|AV2-38|AV5|AV5-38|AV6|AV6-38|AV7|AV7-38|AiJi|AiJi-38|BV4|BV4-38|BV5|BV5-38|IDT|IDT-38|NME|NME-38|NV3|NV3-38|TV1.2|TV1.2-38|user_defined_path>ACV6      Agilent.V6COSMICAV2       Agilent_Exome_V2AV5       Agilent_Exome_V5AV6       Agilent_Exome_V6AV7       Agilent_Exome_V7AiJi      AIJI_ExomeBV4       BGI_Exome_V4_kitBV5       BGI_Exome_V5_kitIDT       xgen_targetNME       Nimblegen_MedExome_V2NV3       Roche_SeqCapEZ_Exome_v3.0TV1.2     Illumina.truseq.v1.2notice:1. "*-38" is used for hg38, e.g. "BV4-38";2. user defined bed file path is supported;
